title: Best of The Herd for Feb 20, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Feb 20, 2020
description:
Colin says Tom Brady is simply mad at the Patriots but does not truly want to leave them in free agency. He explains why the Tyson/Fury fight is special because there is nothing in sports like a heavy weight fight. He talks with Eagles Tackle Lane Johnson in studio about the shots they've taken at each other in the past and why the Eagles can rebound after the disappointing 2019 season. Plus, Tyson Fury joins Colin live from Las Vegas to talk about his big fight on Saturday night.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
